mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Rand McNally New commercial atlas map of South Carolina
New commercial atlas map of South Carolina
South Carolina automobile road map
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 2 maps on 1 sheet (both sides) : col. ; each map 48 x 65 cm. on sheet 53 x 72 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The main map shows county lines and is keyed numerically to show the tracks of 27 railroads. It also shows electric lines and steamship lines. Map on verso has a secondary title in red of "South Carolina automobile road map." The roads are not numbered. [original]
"Principal cities" directory is printed in the left margin and "123 E" appears at the lower right corner of both maps. [original]
The road map is "divided into 10 mile squares." [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Transportation--South Carolina--Maps
Railroads--South Carolina--Maps

South Carolina--Maps
